text: Catherine Margaret Ashton, Baroness Ashton of Upholland, (born 20 March 1956 at Upholland, Lancashire) is a British Labour politician. She was born in Upholland, Lancashire, England. In November 2009, she was appointed to be the first European Foreign Minister. == References == == Other websites == *Ashton's profile on the European Commission web site Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:High Representatives of the Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy Category:Politicians from Lancashire
title: Catherine Ashton
